content.text:
Based on the following clothing item details, generate a compelling product title and description for an e-commerce listing.

Category: pants
Metadata: {
    "color": "light blue",
    "fit": "skinny",
    "material": "denim",
    "pattern": "solid",
    "style": "casual"
}

Return your response in this exact JSON format:
{
    "title": "concise product title (max 80 characters)",
    "description": "detailed product description (2-3 sentences)",
    "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2", "keyword3"]
}
